username.description: This can be a Cluster-scoped or SVM-scoped account, depending on whether a Cluster-level or SVM-level API is required. For more information, please read the documentation U(https://goo.gl/BRu78Z).

name.description: The name of the aggregate to manage.

hostname.description: The hostname or IP address of the ONTAP instance.

disk_count.description: Number of disks to place into the aggregate, including parity disks. The disks in this newly-created aggregate come from the spare disk pool. The smallest disks in this pool join the aggregate first, unless the C(disk-size) argument is provided. Either C(disk-count) or C(disks) must be supplied. Range [0..2^31-1]. Required when C(state=present).

state.description: Whether the specified aggregate should exist or not.
